DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy safety 10-weeks oral consumption Zanthoxylum schinifolium seed Oil ( ZSO ) patient mild dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Oral Zanthoxylum Schinifolium Seed Oil Individuals With Dry Eye Disease
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , randomize placebo-controlled trial , twenty participant experience dry eye symptom recruit , randomly assign consume 4 g/day either ZSO soy bean oil ( SBO ) placebo 10 week . All participant complete study . Follow-ups dry eye symptom objective sign , inflammatory oxidative stress marker , blood lipid analysis perform .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : men woman 20 70 year dry eye disease low tear breakup time ( TBUT ) ( < 10 second ) low Schirmer score ( application local anesthetic ) ( < 10mm 5 min ) presence corneal conjunctival damage time screen . blood level triglyceride high 150 mg/dL HDLcholesterol less 40 50 mg/dL men woman , respectively . antiinflammatory eye drop dry eye ( topical steroid topical cyclosporin ) hypolipidemic medication within 3 month study entry history chronic disease clinical trial use investigative medicinal product within 2 month first dose present study allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product . woman pregnant breast feed history alcoholism drug abuse medical psychological condition
